channel.title: Wanderhome (Thursdays in June, 9pm US Eastern)
channel.description:
This is for a four-session run of the cozy pastoral fantasy game *, Wanderhome* , scheduled for 9:00pm US Eastern time on Thursdays in June. Prior experience with the game is not expected (rules will be taught during and throughout play). I will send out a group email about a week before the first session to confirm everyone’s intent to play and to provide set-up and invitation details. We will be playing without a "guide," meaning the game will be GM-less and we will all work together to create the stories and situations that our characters play through, as is the case with other Belonging Outside Belonging/No Dice, No Masters-style games. We will be playing as traveling fantasy animals (in the style of Redwall) who grow, learn from one another, and heal as they share their travels with other characters, visit new and wondrous locations, and experience all the seasons of the world around them.
*Set forth into a world of grassy fields, mossy shrines, herds of bumblebees, rabbits in sundresses, geckos with suspenders, starry night skies, and the most beautiful sunsets you can imagine. We will befriend stag beetles the size of houses, argue with the King of the Floating Mountain, fall in love in the basket of a hot air balloon up in the clouds, and go on a journey with some of the most amazing people you could ask for. Where will we go? What will we see? We’ll have to find out together. Will you join me?*
My hope is that this game will feel warm, heartfelt, "feel-good," and--dare I say, therapeutic.
Session 1: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MY7c2mSeu47O03eMMe6
Session 2: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MY7cy2MmcxNpgLFARLs
Session 3: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MY7dDzSU5NAr81O4_lt
Session 4: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MY7dYmmDpRaFCCKsuFB
**System :** Wanderhome
**Duration :** Four 3-hour sessions
**Breaks :** Short breaks at the top of each hour-ish (5-10 minutes)
**Venue :** Zoom
**Recording :** With permission from all participants before and after the session
**Attendance :** Sign up for whichever sessions you can attend! This game is great for dropping in and out.
**Safety :** Lines & Veils, X-card, Open Door Policy. Tools can be modified throughout the game to suit player needs.
This game will follow the [Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html).
If you sign up and your availability changes, please remember to drop from the calendar posting and send me a heads-up. All-access sign-up opens on April 15, 9:00pm US Eastern.
